xwikidoc.title: Main Translations
xwikidoc.content:
admin.activeDirectoryConnection=Connection Settings admin.activeDirectoryConfiguration=Configuration admin.activeDirectoryConfigurationAdvanced=Advanced admin.activeDirectoryConfigurationAdvanced.show=Show Advanced Configuration admin.activeDirectoryConfigurationAdvanced.hide=Hide Advanced Configuration admin.activeDirectoryMiscellaneous=Miscellaneous activeDirectory.error.missingLdapService=Active Directory service is not available. Please verify your installation. activeDirectory.warning.ldapAuthenticationIsNotEnabled=The system could not connect to Active Directory server because the LDAP authentication service is not enabled. Edit the ##{0}## file, add the following lines and restart the wiki: activeDirectory.default=(Default) activeDirectory.aDGroup.placehoder=Active Directory group activeDirectory.xWikiGroup.placeholder=XWiki group activeDirectory.aDUserField.placeholder=Active Directory user field activeDirectory.xWikiUserProperty.placeholder=XWiki user property activeDirectory.resetGroupCache.submit=Reset group cache activeDirectory.save.submit=Save activeDirectory.resetGroupCacheSuccess=Groups cache has been reset. activeDirectory.newEntry.title=New Entry activeDirectory.checkConnection=Check connection activeDirectory.checkConnection.error=Failed to connect to the Active Directory server! Click on this message for details and contact sales@xwiki.com. activeDirectory.checkConnection.success=Test connection succedeed!
XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap=Enable the Active Directory authentification XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap.hint=Enable the Active Directory authentication for this wiki. If enabled and configured properly, a local user will be created whenever an Active Directory user visit this wiki for the first time. The default is 'yes'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_server=Active Directory server address XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_server.hint=The default is '127.0.0.1'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_port=Active Directory server port XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_port.hint=The default is '389'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_bind_DN=Active Directory login matching XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_bind_DN.hint=Leave empty for anonymous access, otherwise specify full dn. E.g. cn=admin,dc=example,dc=com. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_bind_pass=Active Directory password matching XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_bind_pass.hint=The password used in combination with Active Directory login matching. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_user_group=Restrict to group XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_user_group.hint=Only the members of the following Active Directory group can authenticate. If you leave empty, all the users from the Base DN will be verified. E.g. cn=developers,ou=groups,o=XWiki,c=FR. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_exclude_group=Active Directory group to exclude XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_exclude_group.hint=The users that are member of the following group can't authenticate. E.g. cn=designers,ou=groups,o=XWiki,c=FR. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_base_DN=Active Directory Base DN XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_base_DN.hint=The Base DN is the root of the tree where the server performs the search. E.g. dc=example,dc=com. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_UID_attr=Active Directory UID attribute name XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_UID_attr.hint=Specifies the Active Directory attribute containing the identifier to be used as the XWiki user name. The default is 'sAMAccountName'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_trylocal=Try local login XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_trylocal.hint=If Active Directory authentication fails for any reason, try XWiki DB authentication with the same credentials. The default is 'yes'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_update_user=Update user from Active Directory after login XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_update_user.hint=If 'Yes', update the mapped attributes from Active Directory to XWiki on every login, else the mapping will be updated only when the user is created. The default is 'yes'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_update_photo=Update user photo from LDAP XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_update_photo.hint=If 'Yes', the XWiki avatar will be synchronized with the Active Directory on every login, else the photo will not be updated. The default in 'no'. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_photo_attachment_name=Attachment name used to save the Active Directory photo XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_photo_attachment_name.hint=The Active Directory photo name that will be used in XWiki profile. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_photo_attribute=Active Directory photo attribute name XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_photo_attribute.hint=Specifies the Active Directory attribute that contains the photo image. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_fields_mapping=Active Directory user fields mapping XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_fields_mapping.hint=Map an Active Directory user field to a XWiki user property. E.g. first_name->givenName. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_group_mapping=Active Directory groups mapping XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_group_mapping.hint=Map an Active Directory group to a XWiki group. E.g. XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup->cn=marketing,ou=groups,dc=example. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_groupcache_expiration=Active Directory groups cache expiration XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_groupcache_expiration.hint=Time in seconds after which the list of members in a group is refreshed from Active Directory. The default is 21600 (6 hours). XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_mode_group_sync=When to synchronize the Active Directory groups XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_mode_group_sync.hint=The groups will be syncronized by default on every authentication of a user. XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_mode_group_sync_always=At each authentication of a user XWiki.XWikiPreferences_ldap_mode_group_sync_create=Upon creation of a user
